titles.title: Investing in VETS Act
Investing in Veteran Entrepreneurial Talents Act
Investing in VETS Act
To amend the Small Business Act to increase in Governmentwide goal for participation in Federal contracts by small business concerns owned and controlled by service-disabled veterans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary:
Investing in Veteran Entrepreneurial Talents Act or the Investing in VETS Act
This bill raises from 3% to 5% the federal contracting participation goal for small businesses that are owned and controlled by service-disabled veterans.
